XenotypeDef.label: Vault Dweller
XenotypeDef.description: Vault Dwellers grew up behind steel doors and sterile lights, sheltered from the chaos above. When the world outside decayed, they evolved withinâ€”disciplined, educated, but naive to the raw savagery of the surface. Some see them as saviors. Others, as pampered relics playing hero in a world that forgot their comfort.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Descendants of those who survived the Great War sealed within underground vaults.
